title: La Joya
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Vegans can rest assured that your food is 100% percent vegan. The soup d jour is usually vegan plus there is a vegan veggie burger, many vegan starters and more. Inform the server you are vegan and they will describe in detail what is vegan and how it is prepared. Because all food is prepared to order the food does take some time to arrive.
